references: Related: CF 189147, CF 134130, CF 189698. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning under Ordinance No. 45382; regulating the use of land and premises thereunder; creating a first and second manufacturing district; amending Sections 2, 7, and 8 of said Ordinance No. 45382 and adding a new section 7.5 to said Ordinance.
